item.title: Webhooks on WordPress.com
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: I’m thrilled to have webhooks on WordPress.com open for everyone today! Eoin Gallagher and I used mitcho‘s HookPress WordPress plugin for this. I’ve been talking with mitcho and he’ll be incorporating some of our changes in the next release of HookPress. This is one of those foundational technologies that I’m really excited to have launched […]
item.content:encoded:
I’m thrilled to have webhooks on WordPress.com open for everyone today! Eoin Gallagher and I used mitcho‘s HookPress WordPress plugin for this. I’ve been talking with mitcho and he’ll be incorporating some of our changes in the next release of HookPress.

This is one of those foundational technologies that I’m really excited to have launched and even more excited to see what people us it for.
